GameMapLoader
Game Map Loader Class This game maps are tile based every map is 32 by 18 tiles map object should be created with the appropriate screen size so that it can create the AABBs properly Class is little bit static in order to simply the loading process According to the type, AABBs are morphed according to the type statically.
